title: Can Riot just gut Vayne instead of this piss-weak AD nerf...
body: I'm sure everyone is well aware of my dislike of the current state of botlane in almost every single way but it's just revolting how one champion has ducked the nerf hammer for such a long time. Every time Vayne is even the slightest bit viable she becomes dominant and drowns out every other ADC pick. But hey, it probably won't happen because she has mobility and "mobility makes the game exciting". #betternerfkogmaw

replies.body: Morello obviously can't hit Fizz and Vayne as they always dodge skillshots.
To think I was trying to main ADC again
I love how a adc can take a full build tank hp from 100 to 0 in 3 basic attacks bs true damage
W scales with levels and not AD so she'd probably do better in a solo lane if played safely at first
Hey it's not her fault Jinx, Tristana, Lucian, Graves, Sivir, Kalista, Ashe, Corki and Twitch got nerfed
Jinx is still a hypercarry though.
Poor Kog'maw, he's like... That guy that I shall not remember{{champion:83}}
Yeah Jinx and Vayne are the only two marksman I pick at the moment, they can get through lane fine and have the ability to beat other role late game.

I think the problem with vayne is that she has a lot of utility as well as damage. She has mobility with her q that does damage also, she has a solid stun or at very least a push with her condemn that also does damage, she has %HP damage every 3 attacks and it doesn't even have a period where she can't use it on the same unit twice in a short amount of time like most other champs (braum, Naught, J4) and she can go unviable with her Ult and do even more damage ... Compare that to say Sivir ... Who has no CC and her only mobility is from her ult sure her q is long ranged and her W is great for wave clear and team fights but her q is the only spell that actually does damage and her w just makes her autos better .. I think out of all the ADC's vayne needs the biggest rework/nerf .
I'm not trying to say the Vayne nerfs aren't enough, but when Riot breaks every ADC in the bot lane in the upcoming Marksman update, they might want to leave Vayne alone.
I'd normally argue that Vayne is strong late game and weak early game, which is how she's supposed to be, but.... She's not even fucking weak early game, not anymore. It's dumb as fuck.
